title: Update admin credentials to ANAS/Anas@2020

requirements.text: Update the hardcoded admin credentials in the frontend authentication hook to use username 'ANAS' and password 'Anas@2020'

quotes: admin panel me user name ANAS rakho aur pass Anas@2020 rakho

acceptanceCriteria: Admin login form accepts username 'ANAS' with password 'Anas@2020'
Session storage and authentication state management remain unchanged

constraints: Do not modify the authentication flow or session management logic
Keep the existing AdminLoginForm component interface unchanged
nonGoals: Adding user registration or password reset features
